Description: The Network Security Engineer will manage daily operations related to perimeter security and infrastructure within global data centers and cloud subscriptions. This role involves proactive problem identification, solution proposals, and handling service requests from customers while working remotely.

Title: Senior Technical Product Manager, Partnerships
Description: The Senior Technical Product Manager will lead the development and execution of product vision with a focus on establishing and managing strategic partnerships for third-party integrations. This role involves collaborating with engineering and stakeholders to enhance user experience and drive business growth through effective integration strategies.

Title: Solutions Architect | Remote | NA
Description: The Solutions Architect at Degreed will play a crucial role in ensuring clients successfully integrate and optimize their use of the Degreed platform. This position involves collaborating with cross-functional teams, scoping technical engagements, and delivering tailored solutions to enhance client success.

Title: Sr. Reporting Data Analyst
Description: The Sr. Reporting Data Analyst collaborates with various stakeholders to enhance business insights through advanced analytics and reporting. This role involves mentoring junior analysts, leading project teams, and applying expertise in data visualization and engineering to support decision-making processes.

Title: Azure Developer with Dot Net
Description: The Azure Developer with Dot Net will design and deliver distributed cloud solutions using Microsoft Azure, focusing on system integrations across various applications. The role involves collaborating with architecture teams, developing best practices, and participating in all phases of development from design to maintenance.

Title: Data Architect (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Description: The Data Architect at CapTech is responsible for aligning clients' business goals with data management technologies to enhance data use and streamline data flows. This role involves assessing current data practices, formulating strategic plans, and collaborating with stakeholders to maximize the value of client data.

Title: Developer Advocate
Description: As a Developer Advocate at BrowserStack, you will bridge the gap between technology and the developer community by creating engaging technical content and building strong relationships with developers. Your role involves representing the company at industry events and helping developers succeed by providing them with the necessary resources and support.

Title: Senior Security Engineer
Description: The Senior Security Engineer (IAM Identity Engineer) at 10x Genomics will be responsible for enhancing identity and access management systems, focusing on maturing the Okta implementation and hardening AWS IAM configurations. The role requires deep knowledge of security practices and collaboration with engineering teams to improve overall product security.

Title: Director, Salesforce Administration
Description: The Director of Salesforce Administration at Ziff Davis will lead teams supporting multiple Salesforce Orgs and collaborate with various business units to define the vision and roadmap for Salesforce solutions. This hands-on leadership role involves managing Salesforce environments, overseeing a team of developers and admins, and implementing complex Salesforce projects.

Title: Technical Lead Manager, Embedded Safety
Description: The Technical Lead Manager, Embedded Safety will be responsible for defining and implementing a technology vision for new fleet safety features while managing the engineering team. This role requires a leader with extensive experience in embedded software engineering and a strong ability to collaborate across multiple teams to drive product outcomes.

Title: SAP Manufacturing Consultant -Production Planning (Remote)
Description: The SAP Manufacturing Consultant - Production Planning will lead the migration of manufacturing processes to SAP ECC, focusing on production order processing, capacity planning, and scheduling. This role involves analyzing existing workflows, configuring the SAP PP module, and ensuring seamless integration with other SAP modules while providing training and support during the migration phase.

Title: Software Engineer - Remote Canada
Description: The Software Engineer will design and develop software solutions to improve health outcomes, working remotely from anywhere in Canada. Responsibilities include providing code and documentation, participating in design reviews, troubleshooting production issues, and suggesting process improvements.

Title: PAM Implementation Engineer (Remote in the US)
Description: The PAM Engineer will be responsible for implementing and maintaining Privileged Access Management solutions in client environments, focusing on products like CyberArk, Delinea, or BeyondTrust. This role involves troubleshooting installations, assisting in daily operations, and executing project tasks while collaborating with other teams.

Title: Quantitative Analyst II, Merchant Pricing
Description: The Quantitative Analyst II, Merchant Pricing at Affirm will focus on optimizing portfolio segments and enhancing analytical capabilities to improve loan economics. This role involves extracting consumer insights, partnering with analytics teams, and simplifying complex models for pricing analytics.

Title: Artificial Intelligence Machine Learning (AI/ML) Governance Subject Matter Expert (SME)
Description: The Artificial Intelligence Machine Learning (AI/ML) Governance Subject Matter Expert (SME) will provide AI risk management, policy development, and compliance consulting across DoD AI initiatives. This role focuses on establishing a robust governance structure to ensure ethical AI adoption and risk mitigation.

Title: Sr PEGA Application Developer
Description: The Senior PEGA Application Developer is responsible for designing and developing applications that automate business processes using PEGA solutions. This role involves collaborating with various business units, delivering backlog items, and providing support for complex issues.

Title: Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET)
Description: The Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) will support testing activities for the Microsoft Fabric Release 1 project, collaborating with various stakeholders to interpret requirements and develop robust technical solutions. Responsibilities include creating test scripts, validating data across different layers, and ensuring the quality of Power BI reports through comprehensive testing.

Title: Software Engineer, Mid (Inventory)
Description: As a Software Engineer on the Inventory & Procurement team at Settle, you will develop inventory management software to help brands manage and forecast their inventory needs. You will collaborate with Product and Design teams to create user-friendly features while continuously improving engineering processes.

Title: Senior Application Engineer
Description: The Senior Application Engineer will support the adoption of the iTwin and Cesium platforms by collaborating with product teams to define integration architectures and troubleshoot integration issues. This role involves facilitating architecture discussions, documenting best practices, and communicating the platform's value to stakeholders.

Title: Data Scientist
Description: The Consultant SME (Principal Data Scientist-Data Bricks) role involves providing expertise in cloud operations support, particularly in Azure and large-scale cloud environments. The position requires proficiency in Databricks and various cloud services, along with strong scripting skills and the ability to troubleshoot complex system issues.

Title: SR Remedy Admin / Developer
Description: The SR Remedy Admin / Developer is responsible for the installation, configuration, and administration of BMC Remedy software, ensuring it meets IT and business needs. The role requires extensive experience in developing and managing BMC Remedy applications, as well as performing upgrades and enhancements.

Title: Network Engineer
Description: The Network Engineer will be responsible for mapping and cleaning up IP overlaps, migrating WAN to a SilverPeak SDWAN solution, and conducting network assessments. The role also involves implementing network changes, troubleshooting issues, and managing vulnerabilities and patches.

Title: Oracle R12 Developers
Description: The position is for a Senior Oracle R12 Application Developer with extensive experience in the manufacturing industry. The candidate must have a strong background in installing and implementing MES, as well as supporting various R12 modules such as DM, SCM, and O2C.

Title: SAP Retail Technical/Integration PM
Description: The SAP Retail Technical/Integration PM is responsible for architecting and delivering integrated solutions across various SAP modules and non-SAP applications in the retail sector. This role involves collaborating with stakeholders to define digital roadmaps and ensuring project deliverables align with business requirements and best practices.

Title: Infrastructure Engineer
Description: The Infrastructure Engineer will support a data center for a mid-sized firm, focusing on existing systems and network infrastructure while gaining experience in IT Security and Cloud technologies. The role requires both on-site and remote work, with a strong emphasis on AWS and Azure cloud support.

Title: Infotainment Cybersecurity QA
Description: The Infotainment Cybersecurity QA role involves developing and maintaining security processes for ECU and system-level testing. The position requires hands-on cybersecurity testing, documentation of findings, and collaboration with product teams to ensure security measures are integrated during development.

Title: Drupal Architect / Team Lead
Description: Evolving Web is seeking a Drupal Architect/Team Lead to serve as an in-house technical expert. The role involves collaborating with a development team to architect technical solutions, manage projects, and enhance internal processes while ensuring high-quality web design and development.

Title: Sr. Data Analyst
Description: AG1 is seeking a Senior Data Analyst who is passionate about data-driven marketing and excels in leveraging data insights to drive customer acquisition and growth. The role involves analyzing trends, producing visualizations, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver actionable insights that align with business KPIs.

Title: Staff Software Engineer - MetaMask
Description: The Staff Software Engineer at MetaMask will contribute to enhancing user experiences across various platforms, including the Portfolio dApp, Browser Extension, and Mobile. The role involves mentoring junior team members and collaborating with other teams to complete complex projects in a dynamic web3 environment.

Title: Lead Developer & Architect - Marketing Automation
Description: The Lead Developer & Architect - Marketing Automation at World Vision will design and implement a new Iterable-based marketing automation platform to enhance donor experiences. This role requires a blend of technical expertise and strategic thinking to drive digital transformation and optimize marketing campaigns.

Title: Lead ServiceNow Practice Architect (Remote)
Description: The Lead ServiceNow Practice Architect serves as the technical leader, shaping innovative ServiceNow solutions and driving the growth of the business. This role involves mentoring talent, designing implementation frameworks, and engaging with clients to present technical solutions.

Title: ERP Business Systems Analyst -Finance
Description: The ERP Business Systems Analyst - Finance at iRhythm is responsible for developing complex SAP implementations and driving design and technical solutions in a fast-paced environment. This role requires excellent stakeholder management, technical skills, and expertise in SAP Finance modules, along with a strong understanding of healthcare industry requirements.
